```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

state_compare = read_csv("data/state_donor_share.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = donor_designation_share, color = state)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth() +
    labs(title = "State Percentage Enrolled Comparison",
         x = "Year",
         y = "Percent Eligible Enrolled")
